Class BankManager

java.lang.Object
Person
BankManager
public class BankManager extends Person
Represents a Bank Manager with special privileges and responsibilities. Bank Managers can: - Look up any customer's accounts - Create new customers - Process transaction files - Generate bank statements - Handle customer searches

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    BankManager(String name, Map<String,Customer> customers, TransactionLog logger)
    Creates a new Bank Manager with access to all customer data.

    • BankManager

      public BankManager(String name, Map<String,Customer> customers, TransactionLog logger)
      Creates a new Bank Manager with access to all customer data.
      Parameters:
      name - the manager's name
      customers - map of all customers in the system
      logger - transaction logging system

  • Method Details

    • getCustomers

      public Map<String,Customer> getCustomers()
      Returns the map of all customers in the system.
      Returns:
      map of all customers in the system

    • createNewCustomer

      public Optional<Customer> createNewCustomer(Map<String,String> userData)
      Creates a new customer account with all required information. Validates name for duplicates and creates all necessary accounts.
      Parameters:
      userData - map containing all customer information
      Returns:
      Optional containing the new customer if creation successful

    • searchCustomers

      public List<Customer> searchCustomers(String searchName, boolean isFirstName)
      Searches for customers by name, handling cases where multiple customers share the same first or last name.
      Parameters:
      searchName - the name to search for
      isFirstName - true if searching by first name, false for last name
      Returns:
      list of matching customers

    • findCustomerInteractive

      public Optional<Customer> findCustomerInteractive(String firstName, String lastName)
      Interactive method to help bank manager find specific customer when multiple matches exist.
      Parameters:
      firstName - first name to search
      lastName - last name to search
      Returns:
      selected customer or empty if none found

    • generateBankStatement

      public String generateBankStatement(Customer customer)
      Generates a bank statement for a specific customer
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to generate statement for
      Returns:
      filename of generated statement

    • processTransactionFile

      public void processTransactionFile()
      Process a transaction file containing multiple banking operations.

    • lookupAccountByNumber

      public Optional<Account> lookupAccountByNumber(String accountNumber)
      Looks up an account by its account number across all customers.
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - the account number to search for
      Returns:
      Optional containing the account if found
